EVENT CATEGORIES
================

 1. Graduation
 2. Festival
 3. Competition
 4. Private Session
 5. Wedding/Engagement
 6. Birthday
 7. School Events
 8. Charity
 9. Corporate
10. Pet Events
11. Seasonal
12. Photography Walks
13. Community

NOTES:
- Total categories: 13
- Category IDs are sequential starting from 1
- Each event must belong to one category
- Pictures inherit the category from their event
